title: Gluten free banana protein pancakes
ingredients: ['Dry ingredients', '40g oats', '1 scoop protein powder (optional)', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'Wet ingredients', '1 banana', '2 eggs', '110g cottage cheese', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'water as needed']
